mapper.insert: insert into t_info_slideshow_home ( slideshow_id, slideshow_num, slideshow_path, start_time, end_time, goods_id, is_delete, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, version ) values ( #{slideshowId}, #{slideshowNum}, #{slideshowPath}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{goodsId}, #{isDelete}, #{createUser}, now(), #{updateUser}, now(), #{version} );
mapper.select:
select slideshow_num slideshowNum, slideshow_path slideshowPath, slideshow_state_id slideshowStateId, start_time startTime, end_time endTime, slideshow_id slideshowId, version version from t_info_slideshow_home where is_delete = 0
and slideshow_state_id = #{slideshowStateId}

select goods_id goodsId, goods_name goodsName, one_classify_id oneClassifyId, two_classify_id twoClassifyId, goods_state_id goodsStateId from t_info_goods where is_delete = 0
and goods_name like concat('%', #{goodsName}, '%')
and goods_id like concat('%', #{goodsId}, '%')

update.foreach: update t_info_slideshow_home set slideshow_state_id = #{slideshowHomeInfos.slideshowStateId}, version = #{slideshowHomeInfos.version}, update_user = #{slideshowHomeInfos.updateUser}, update_time = now() where slideshow_id = #{slideshowHomeInfos.slideshowId} and is_delete = 0 and version = #{slideshowHomeInfos.oldVersion};
